title: Landing Page Template Center
subtitle: Explore our carefully designed three Landing Page templates, each optimized for different use cases and development needs

basic.title: Basic Components
basic.description: Ready-to-use simple components with minimal configuration, perfect for quick setup

advanced.title: Advanced Components
advanced.description: Feature-rich components with more configuration options and visual effects

custom.title: Custom Components
custom.description: Fully customizable components with deep customization configuration support

guide.title: How to Choose the Right Components?
guide.subtitle: Choose the most suitable component type based on your project needs and development experience

step1.title: Beginners or Quick Prototyping
step1.description: Choose basic components, zero configuration ready to use, quickly build product prototypes

step2.title: Commercial Projects
step2.description: Choose advanced components, rich features and visual effects enhance user experience

step3.title: Custom Requirements
step3.description: Choose custom components, complete control over every detail, meet special needs

cta.title: Start Exploring Components
cta.subtitle: Each component is carefully designed and tested to ensure perfect operation in various scenarios
